title: 10 Bans When? Who would you ban?
body:
Right now, champion banning is only determined by 3 people of the 5 in a team.
There are 134 champions and only 6 bans. So what, only 4% of the champions not allowed? Whatta hell. 
Wouldn't it be better if each person could ban one champion that either they hate or don't want to lane against?

Also if there were 10 bans, here would be my preferred bans.
{{champion:51}}  - Stupid ass range, the traps are ridiculous and her passive is free damage for whatever reason
{{champion:122}} - Just annoying overall, would rather not deal with.
{{champion:81}} - One of those if on your team they do nothing, on enemy team they are gods paradoxes.
{{champion:39}} - Broken champion, build armor you're fucked, build health you're fucked, build tenacity, you're out
{{champion:92}} - Another paradox, feeds if on your team, does otherwise if on the enemy team. Also retarded kit, an AD scaling shield, numerous dashes, hard CC, if you beat her she leaves, if you don't, she chases you no problem.
{{champion:157}} - Paradox champion.
{{champion:64}} - Overloaded kit, just delete him already.
{{champion:412}} - Overloaded, don't delete, just take away some cc.
{{champion:164}} - Overloaded, stop the scaling with on hit effects on the true damage.
 {{champion:12}} - Couldn't think of any other champion so the cow gets it.

10 bans when Rito?

replies.body: No Leblanc or Hecarim? Iunno about this list.
Ban Yasuo untill 100% ban rate so that maybe you guys have mercy and rework him ?
https://i.imgflip.com/tiz9p.jpg

And the answer to the question....?

The game is loaded with champions and underloaded with champion bans. This is an issue, and we would appreciate an answer as to when this will be implemented.

They've answered this question before.

Basically, it's a feature that will only work in the new client, so it won't be implemented until the new client is out of beta and no one is using the legacy client any more.


A nice post explaining it here, with links to appropriate Riot sources: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/xcc2FjTP-reminder-why-we-dont-have-10-bans-yet-despite-promises

Despite your the oh so helpful fanboi service, that is no answer to the question asked.

The question was:

#WHEN

That is a specific question, to which an unspecific, vague answer like _"sometime after the new client is out of beta, whenever that may be"_ is entirely unsatisfactory. Its a disgrace.

Especially when you keep in mind that the very boards we are writing on are still "Beta". How long was it since the were released? Two years? Three?:

https://s30.postimg.org/v6am0e1oh/stillbeta.jpg

So next time, maybe a little less fanboism and a little more attention to the actual questions asked by the community. The same advice goes towards riot, who seem to enjoy basking in the laurels of a mass of obedient yesmen much more, than answering the questions of people who actually care about the development of the game.
----

You will of course downvote this comment, to satisfy your Ego. I understand.
Be advised however, that this doesn't prove me wrong, nor does it make you more credible. It just shows how small said Ego is.

The client will probably be forced out of beta sooner rather than later. (And no not soon as in Riot soon, soon as in normal soon) Riot won't tolerate players being able to use two clients to log in for very long because it makes the game look like a two-bit operation. So I expect the new client comes out of beta just as the old one disappears in the near future.

Now, whether or not Riot actually comes through on those ten bans at that time is a separate matter completely. I've been around long enough to have heard Riot's lies too. I remember the tribunal returning , soloQ coming back in season 6, promises to ensure Morde wouldn't fall into a rusty pile of scraps after his rework, and those are just the broken promises of recent memory.

Do I think there will be ten bans? I'd give it a 50/50 at best. More realistically a 40/60 in favor of "no". Riot has a history of protecting and favoring certain champions, and those would be the the first ones to go permaban status after the obvious balance nightmares get their bans.
"Probably" and "Soon" are the words that will make everyone who is remotely familiar with how Rito handles these things cringe.

Meddler stated the new client will be out of beta January-February and 10 bans soon after that. Along with other features. 
Make sure you do your research before you go keyboard warrior

They also stated that SoloQ would come one month after Dynamic queue (In season 6)

That's how much I trust such statements.

Fanbois and their selective memory...
Quick question, if you are gonna hate on everything riot does... Why play the game?
Dang dude, I think you need to take a big ol' dose of chill the hell out. Don't need no name calling around here. All of ya.
Geez man, you don't have to be a dick about it.
I mean, we have a history of them not delivering things. Still waiting for the return of the tribunal.

"The community overwhelmingly votes to punish homophobic slurs in the tribunal"

I cry every time I see this.  

------------------------------

Really though Riot have been very good lately about communicating with players and delivering on their promises.
And don't forget last season's continual soloq delay into being scrapped into being brought back this season.

I dunno, I would venture to say his kit is a bit overloaded but he is balanced despite that.  When you look at the number of things he can do he is pretty crazy.  Infinite stacking AP and Armour, A stun/2 part displacement/dash, A ranged aoe shield that doubles as an ally targeted dash and is infinitely scaling, an aoe knockback in any direction regardless of your position in relation to them, a wall that applies a massive slow multiple times and does a ton of damage on the first instance of it?

He is pretty overloaded, however his kit is very much balanced around that so it isn't that big of an issue.

He is the epitemy of an engage support though, Good reliable cc, multi cc, slows, bit more than soraka damage. and allows another team mate to engage with him. 

BUT, his number are balanced to allow him to do such things.
